price: Mga nakasandal sa mga almohadon na luntian at mga kutson na magaganda.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā rafrafin khuḍ'rin waʿabqariyyin ḥisānin
